Sorry you've been having such a time with this. It really does seem like this is just a simple install issue though so let me see if I can get you through this. 

STEP 1: Delete the folder "GameData Waterfall" inside your GameData folder. Or whatever folder you have in there currently that says Waterfall. 

2. Go [HERE](https://github.com/post-kerbin-mining-corporation/Waterfall/releases) and download the file "Waterfall\_0\_6\_3.zip"

3. Once you open the download you will see the following files:  

   "GameData"  

   "changelog.txt"  

   "readme.txt"

Double click the folder titled "GameData"

4. Now you will see the following files:  

   "Waterfall"  

   "ModuleManager4.1.4.dll"

Copy the folder "Waterfall"

5. Go to your GameData folder where all of your current mods are. Paste.  

Now you should see a folder titled "Waterfall" inside you GameData folder. Boot up the game and check your plumes, they should work.

I will do that now.  Thanks!
